title: TKT-183.6: Phase 3 — Domain Sanity & Statistical Validation
description: Validation phase. Domain sanity review (Andy Flower), statistical robustness checks (Jose Mourinho), edge case analysis (Pep Guardiola). Verify weights produce cricket-sensible outputs. Check for outliers, small-sample artifacts, and counter-intuitive rankings. Estimated: 1-2 days.
